title: National Day of Prayer
description: Join of for National Day of Prayer from 6-7 at the Cornerstone Bible Church.

title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring a non-perishable food item for our local food bank.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: This Sunday, March 9th, we have the opportunity to minister to the residents at BVLC. Please come and worship with these dear people at 2:30PM at BVLC.

title: Ladies Lunch at the Park
description: During the summer months, let's enjoy the sunshine and fellowship at Lone Rock Park as well as devotion. Bring a sack lunch and a lawn chair.

title: Ladies Lunch at the Park

title: VBS Volunteer Meeting (Last Chance)
description: If you missed the first VBS meeting, this is your chance! Please plan to attend one of the two meetings.

title: VBS Volunteer Meeting
description: We will be having a meeting for all VBS volunteers on June 1st after church. Please plan to attend one of the two meetings.

title: Graduation Open House
description: Join us for a graduation open house for our graduates, here at the church. You can pop in and say hi or stay the whole time. No gifts expected, please come enjoy some good food and friends as we celebrate this milestone. Please RSVP so we know how much food to prepare.

title: Missions Trip Lunch
description: The youth group's Alaska missions team will be preparing and serving lunch. If you would like to make a donation we will have jars out, otherwise come enjoy the fellowship time!

title: Vacation Bible School
description: Get ready for adventure in the International Spy Academy! Join us for a week of fun, games, and learning about Jesus. This is a free event for kids ages 5-12. Dinner will be provided each night.
